C

changeInterval() - Static method in class team19.weatherapp.Settings
Changes the intervale that should be used.
City - Class in team19.weatherapp
City class holds the information for the three city properties: Current Weather Short Term Forecast Long Term Forecast The city object encapsulates these three objects, and allows the user to access all of the city data through one object.
City(String, char, char) - Constructor for class team19.weatherapp.City
The city constructor calls a json retriever to set the current temp, short term forecast, and long term forecast data.
convertSpeed(char, double) - Static method in class team19.weatherapp.Utilities
The convertSpeed method converts a temperature value to Kilometers or Miles.
convertTemp(char, double) - Static method in class team19.weatherapp.Utilities
The convertTemp method converts a temperature value from Kelvin to Celsius or Fahrenheit.
CurrentWeather - Class in team19.weatherapp
The CurrrentWeather class holds all of the current weather data for the specified city.
CurrentWeather(JSONObject, char, char) - Constructor for class team19.weatherapp.CurrentWeather
The CurrentWeather constructor retrieves the JSONObject data, and saves the data into variable fields.
